sources.title: Neshima | Full Movie | Action Fantasy Adventure
sources.description:
Neshima - Warring tribes desperately seek the fragments of a sacred crystal key, but when one piece is stolen, Princess Lakshmi must fulfill an ancient prophesy by leaving her tribe, reuniting the crystal, and opening the portal to Neshima.
2016. Stars: Shoshana Chagall, Erin Dinsmore, Vishwanath Iyer

metadata.Plot: Warring tribes desperately seek the fragments of a sacred crystal key, but when one piece is stolen, Princess Lakshmi must fulfill an ancient prophesy by leaving her tribe, reuniting the crystal, and opening the portal to Neshima.
